short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically makes a random move on Lichess analysis mode.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The main purpose of this extension is to help users practice chess openings in a more effective way.

This extension adds to the Lichess analysis board the functionality of playing a random move, based on the frequencies of the moves in the Lichess database. 

This new functionality can be accessed through a new button introduced by the extension at the top header row, or alternatively using the Q key on the keyboard.
